name: UNDEFENDED!
description:
Space baddies are incoming and we're UNDEFENDED! Grab a tower kit and deploy a tower. Make sure your keep them fed with ammo. Disclaimer: may cause fun.

For the best experience, download a native build for your platform or build from source. The web build may have issues with gamepad mapping, audio and a stutter when the game starts.

GamepadKeyboardMoveLeft StickWASD / ← → ↑ ↓InteractWestRJumpSouthSpace

This was built solo in ~7 days for Bevy Jam #3. Many exciting ideas including even attempting to shoehorn the theme in were chopped so that I could present a working and reasonably polished game.

GitHub
